tool_description: Searches patient databases using specified criteria to identify potential clinical trial candidates, applying filters for demographics, conditions, and medical history.

database_source.description: Source database identifier or connection string

primary_condition.description: Primary medical condition or diagnosis code

geographic_radius.description: Search radius in miles from study site (1-500)

site_location.description: Study site location (city, state or zip code)

error_messages: Database connection failed: Verify database_source is accessible and properly formatted.
Invalid age range: age_min must be less than age_max, both between 18-100.
Invalid geographic parameters: geographic_radius must be 1-500 miles, site_location must be valid location.
Condition not found: primary_condition must match valid diagnosis codes in database.
usage: Specify the database source, primary condition, and site location. Optionally filter by age range, gender, and geographic radius to find potential participants matching basic criteria.

patient_ids.description: List of patient identifiers matching search criteria

total_candidates.description: Total number of potential candidates found

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results
